data.title: Communications Settings - Host Enabler - Foundation 24.1 - Foundation 24.1 - Ready - OnBase - external
data.meta_description: All terminal window settings must first be setup in Configuration before Host Enabler can be used. Each type of screen that users will be interacting with must be identified and configured. In addition, special function keys may be configured. To configure the settings needed to connect to the host: Select Configure Te...
data.text:
All terminal window settings must first be setup in Configuration before Host Enabler can be used. Each type of screen that users will be interacting with must be identified and configured. In addition, special function keys may be configured.

To configure the settings needed to connect to the host:
